abstract: The ruling, in Britain was a legal victory for investors who said 3M had failed to make good on a promise to market a test for dangerous bacteria.
snippet: The ruling, in Britain was a legal victory for investors who said 3M had failed to make good on a promise to market a test for dangerous bacteria.
lead_paragraph: A British judge ordered the 3M Corporation to pay $1.3 million in damages Monday after finding that the company had failed to make good on its promise to market a diagnostic test to screen for a dangerous bacterium found in hospitals.
